source.3cf8ad46:
_, axes = plt.subplots(nrows=1, ncols=2, figsize=(12, 6))

sns.countplot(x = 'status', data = data, hue = 'specialisation', ax = axes[0])
sns.countplot(x = 'specialisation', data = data, hue = 'degree_t', ax = axes[1])
plt.show()
